fields.name: William Faulkner
fields.bio: Half mad poet laureate of the South

fields.name: Isaac Asimov
fields.bio: Isaac Asimov was an American writer and professor of biochemistry at Boston University. He was known for his works of science fiction and popular science. Asimov was a prolific writer, and wrote or edited more than 500 books. He also wrote an estimated 90,000 letters and postcards

fields.name: American author of epic fantasy and science fiction. He is best known for the Cosmere fictional universe, in which most of his fantasy novels, most notably the Mistborn series and The Stormlight Archive, are set. He is also known for finishing Robert Jordan's high fantasy series The Wheel of Time.
J.K. Rowling
fields.bio: British author best known for writing the Harry Potter fantasy series, which has won multiple awards and sold more than 500 million copies.
